Description: Jeff is a broker of personalized loan products, connecting borrowers and lending institutions.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Jeff is a personalized loan broker that matches borrowers and lenders through alternative data. Jeff's mission is to help the unbanked to access financial services. In the absence of credit history and bank transactions, Jeff gathers alternative data from sources like smartphones, social media, behavioral patterns, geolocation, and other types of digital footprint. Jeff then puts this information to good use and find ways on how alternative data points can prove creditworthiness and build trust, building new ways of accessing financing and evolving an alternative credit score. The company was founded in 2019 and is located in Riga, Latvia.
Top 5 Investors: Startup Wise Guys, Presto Ventures, iSeed, J12, Toy Ventures

Description: Empyrio provides an innovative on-site solution for sustainable sewage sludge utilization for small and medium waste water treatment plants.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: EMPYRIO inventors developed a system that provides a complex pre-drying and subsequent utilization of high-moisture organic waste. The system operates autonomously, burning waste without the need for additional energy sources or raw materials, ensuring a fully self-sustaining process. The heat generated is efficiently redirected to dry incoming wet waste, enabling continuous utilization. Designed specifically for small and medium-sized wastewater treatment plants, EMPYRIO’s on-site deployment eliminates the need for costly sewage sludge transportation, significantly reducing operational expenses. Traditional disposal methods often involve high gate fees, long-distance transport, and regulatory challenges, whereas EMPYRIO provides a far more cost-effective and compliant alternative. By utilizing the waste directly at its source, facilities avoid dependency on external processing plants and gain long-term financial predictability. In markets like Germany, where sludge disposal costs range from €280 to €480 per ton of dry solids, EMPYRIO’s system can reduce costs to just €150-230 per ton​, delivering multimillion-euro savings over a decade. EMPYRIO’s compact, modular design allows for seamless integration into existing wastewater treatment infrastructure without requiring costly facility modifications. Housed in standard 20- and 40-foot containers​, the system minimizes space requirements while ensuring easy scalability for various plant sizes. EMPYRIO’s technology is particularly effective for high-moisture and viscous organic waste, such as sewage sludge, chicken droppings, and other challenging materials that conventional technologies struggle to process. By providing an energy-efficient, space-saving, and cost-reducing solution, EMPYRIO supports sustainable waste management while ensuring compliance with stringent environmental regulations.

Description: Catalyco is developing a circular economy supply chain for ZnO to reduce imported materials, help the industry meet ESG.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Large amounts of valuable zinc oxide material are wasted due to complex or costly recovery processes, or lack of appropriate technology for recovery. This results in significant financial burdens for catalyst manufacturers who must purchase fresh ZnO to compensate for the lost material. The reliance on imports for 40% of ZnO creates vulnerabilities. We secure a local supply chain for ZnO by extracting it from industrial waste streams. We manufacture advanced ZnO products with unique characteristics and obtain added value in an environmentally friendly way. The potential applications are the tire and rubber industry, adsorbents and catalysts, and because of high purity the cosmetics sector.
Top 5 Investors: EIT InnoEnergy, Commercialization Reactor, EIT RawMaterials, Ready2Scale, BePaMü GmbH

Description: Augmented reality platform where anyone can create their own experiences without code.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Overly is a company with a primary focus on augmented reality solutions, and we are deep in this technology. We have been doing it for almost eight years now. During our work with many different projects, we noticed that people are willing to use this technology. Still, it is quite complicated to understand, challenging to create content and most often requires technical knowledge.  That is why we have created a platform where anyone can create augmented reality experiences easily and without technical knowledge.  Things that we do differently:  Self-Service platform - Augmented reality constructor for fast and easy AR experience creation. Our platform has a very different pricing model and cheaper entry into AR. Client education - Sharing our and our client experiences on how to get most of AR in each business industry and area with customer success team, blog posts, webinars and other tools. Content library - A content library where customers will be able to add 3D models, effects and other pre-made content to their experiences. (similar to Canva) API - To bring AR closer to moments where content is created, we will release an API system for online stores and Print On Demand services (Printful, GetPrintBox) to offer AR services to their clients. Overly a platform is a tool that is aimed at individuals or companies that are looking to create augmented reality themself - without any previous experience or technical knowledge
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Hardware, Other, Sales and Marketing, Software, Travel and Tourism

Description: VOOVOO is a fleet management solution provider that specializes in real-time prevention of car damage and fines.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: VOOVOO is a cutting-edge service designed for commercial fleets to prevent speeding and aggressive driving in real-time, using in-house developed Safe-Driving Technology - VOOBOX. By proactively avoiding potential problems, VOOVOO enhances transportation safety and minimizes operational costs. Today, approximately 360 million commercial vehicles are involved in daily economic activities worldwide. We focus on making our technology available to global commerce, starting from Europe and the US. Our business model's main advantages are simplicity of technology integration, easy distribution, and low costs, enabling us to expand rapidly. Our technology has been developed according to UN international standards, with support from the European Institute of Innovation and Technology (EIT Urban Mobility), Georgias Innovation and Technologies Agency (GITA), Promwad - an electrical engineering company, Testups - Test and certification company, and other international organizations. We have conducted all necessary lab and field tests, so our hardware is now under the certificate, allowing us to sell it in 58 countries. Our five-year industry background, established international relationships, technological market trends, and highly qualified management team provide a solid guarantee for the sustainable growth of our project. We forecast earning up to €36M in 5 years with around €20M net profit. From the ongoing SEED round of €500k, €435k is left to be raised.  €65K is a contribution to the round from CONNECTOLOGY and EIT Urban Mobility.  This investment gives us 18 months runway, enough to meet European standards with a certified product, start supplying reseller partners, onboard about 8 000 cars, and generate €2M+. Feel free to book a call to discuss partnership opportunities: https://calendly.com/voovoo/30min

Description: BranchTrack is an e-learning platform that provides online training related to telemarketing and sales to develop skills.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Back in 2009, they used a popular rapid authoring tool to create a branching scenario game for a team of corporate sales people. It looked nice, was fun to play and offered a lot of realistic choices and unexpected consequences to the learners. However, it spanned 200+ slides, took a long time to publish and changing anything could easily ruin the intricate web of invisible hyperlinks. So next time they used another tool. And then another. At one point, they even built their own sim engine in Flash. It read XML files and animated bubbles smoothly but authoring the scenario was still painful and had to be done on whiteboards and in Excel. They  knew they had to do something.
Industry Groups: Design, Information Technology, Other, Professional Services
Founders: Jean Mauris, Raivis Freimanis, Sergey Snegirev

Description: HYGEN’s ”Wallbox" connected to a regular household gas grid can fuel your gas powered vehicle at-home/office in just 3 minutes.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: HYGEN brings to the market superchargers for G-Mobility that can fuel your Gas Powered Vehicle at home or at the office in just 3 minutes. By utilizing the regular household or office gas distribution grid HYGEN solves the chicken and egg problem of the NGV market turning this grid into a decentralized fuelling infrastructure.  By offering to end-users this low-cost at-home "supercharger" with unique freedom in terms of refueling, HYGEN transforms out-dated NGV image into an appealing and modern EV-like concept. HYGEN's proprietary liquid piston gas compression technology eliminates friction, excess heat and oil vapours. It extends the service life by a factor of 5 and reduces total cost of ownership by six-fold. It results in reinventing at-home fueling concept and enabling HYGEN's direct customers- Gas Utilities to open up for them a completely new business segment – transportation fuel market and to deliver clean and inexpensive fuel to your doorsteps at a competitive price.
Top 5 Investors: Greentown Labs, EIT InnoEnergy, Urban Future Lab, Fraunhofer Venture, H2 Refuel Accelerator

Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Noscos is a face recognition platform technology provider for the media industry, based in Riga, Latvia. . Noscos is part of a promising new wave of EU-based AI/ML startups using machine learning to address key needs in media and broadcast market segments. Noscos’s investors include Latvia’s Overkill Ventures, a leading regional venture capital firm, and Denmark’s Adevo, a media solutions company addressing the needs of Scandinavian brands and advertising firms; NOSCOS also received a grant from Google’s Digital News Initiative.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Software

Description: MightyFingers is an HTML5 game engine for two-dimensional and isometric online games.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: MightyFingers is an HTML5 game engine for two-dimensional and isometric online games. It enables its users to create games with ease and share them within seconds. The game engine offers many features, including open source, web-based, asset management, map editor, physics, code editor, Android export, texture atlas, tile layer support, animation editor, game hosting, grouping, export data, phaser-based, and more. MightyFingers was launched in 2011 in Riga, Latvia.

Description: Manufacturer of unconventional reference grade acoustic systems.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Square Audio was founded in 2012 in Riga, Latvia to research, develop and manufacture non-conventional professional acoustic systems. Prior to the joining forces and creating own company, co-founders Viesturs Balodis (31) and Rolands Janevics (54) were involved in several audio industry related activities such as high end, home audio, car audio and professional acoustic systems design and building as well high end studio microphones, innovative measurement technologies promotion to the global market. After many years involved with the various audio related activities co-founders decided to devote all that gathered experience and knowledge to create and promote the products that are ones of the highest importance in music recording process. The first product created by the company by the end of 2014 is the active two-way reference grade studio monitors called Square One.
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Music and Audio

Description: PractiCan connects students with large and mid-size companies opening doors to professional career.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: PractiCan.com is a professional network for youth. PractiCan connects students with large and mid-size companies opening doors to professional career. Practican is the best place to start your international career - More than 1/2 million internship and graduate job matches already between Students and Companies. Get first work experiences and insights in thousands of companies - Your chance to get an internship or graduate job can increase by 80% if you get a virtual work experience. Find out what it is like to work at real businesses - You can simulate real job situations. Virtual internship tours will help you understand which career excites you most. Apply for international internships and graduate jobs - New vacancies every day. More than 1000 students every day find internships and graduate jobs. Be informed about student job market and career development - Customized daily news about career and job opportunities in your profile. Be the first to find out.
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Education, Professional Services

Description: Stream Networks SIA provides fixed and mobile data transmission services, and Internet access to corporate clients in Latvia.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Full Description: Stream Networks SIA provides fixed and mobile data transmission services, and Internet access to corporate clients in Latvia and the Russian Federation.  SIA "Stream Networks" is one of the leading providers of fixed, mobile data transmission, Internet access services to more than 600 corporate clients in Latvia and Russia, including banks, state and local government institutions. Taking into account the growing demand, the company further develops new data center services that include cloud computing and virtualization solutions.
